code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const faqData=[{question:"What is TuneScout?",answer:"TuneScout is a dynamic music exploration platform designed to help you discover new music tailored to your tastes."},{question:"How do I search for music?",answer:"You can search for music using the search bar on the Discover page. Simply enter the name of the song or album you are looking for."},{question:"Which APIs does TuneScout use?",answer:"TuneScout integrates data from Spotify and Last.fm APIs to deliver a comprehensive music discovery experience."},{question:"Is TuneScout free to use?",answer:"Yes, TuneScout is free to use and provides you with the latest trending music and top artists."}];const FAQ=()=>{const[openIndex,setOpenIndex]=useState(null);const toggleFAQ=index=>{setOpenIndex(openIndex===index?null:index);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-4xl font-bold mb-8 text-center",children:"Frequently Asked Questions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"max-w-2xl mx-auto space-y-4",children:faqData.map((faq,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"border rounded-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onClick:()=>toggleFAQ(index),className:"cursor-pointer flex justify-between items-center p-4 bg-gray-100 rounded-t-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold",children:faq.question}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:openIndex===index?'-':'+'})]}),openIndex===index&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-4 bg-white",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-lg",children:faq.answer})})]},index))})]});};export default FAQ;
